committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Constitution and Civil Justice

official_title: Recognizing the 146th anniversary of the ratification of the 15th amendment to the Constitution of the United States.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text:
Recognizes the 146th anniversary of the ratification of the Fifteenth Amendment, which prohibits the government from denying a citizen the right to vote on the basis of race.

Acknowledges the significance of the Fifteenth Amendment and continues to support its goals and ideals.

titles.title: Recognizing the 146th anniversary of the ratification of the 15th amendment to the Constitution of the United States.
